hackathon-description-text: is the most powerful and accurate visual recognition engine. It enables computers to recognize faces, scenes, and objects, thus providing detailed metadata about pictures and video footage. What then can be done with this metadata is a whole new story. We are offering you an exciting opportunity to be a part of our vision in developing a futuristic world with endless possibilities.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: COO and VP of Business Development at Orbeus

hackathon-requirements: All submission materials must be in English; if not, you must provide either an English translation of all the materials.
hackathon-rules: All submission materials must be in English; if not, you must provide an English translation of all the materials.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: App that receives the most public votes
For applications/extensions that are applicable in different industries

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does it bring the idea to life? Function properly? Are the technicalities well-designed?
Are consumers actually interested in this product? How will it impact society?

hackathon-description-header: Disrupt everyday life with leading computer vision technology. Win over $10000 in cash prizes.
